WorkItem.Description:
I would love to get an XNA skeleton. Which includes the Rendertube, animation Classes and such stuff. 
 
One for simple 2D Games (Only standard Rendertube)
One for 2D Games with animated Sprites
One for 2D Games with Mashes
 
One for simple 3D Games (Only standard Rendertube)
One for 3D Games with different Model Classes, Lightning etc.
 
Importer for Maya, 3D Studio Max, Blender, Cinema 4D Models.

Comments.Message:
Hello sirblacksoul, 

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to develop XNA application.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework team doesn’t have enough resources to support this technology. There are some samples I found from the Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser:
http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Xna-Ball-Bouncing-Game-77a44f5d;
http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Xna-Ball-Bouncing-Game-77a44f5d;
http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Tworzenie-aplikacji-RIA-w-2148a0eb.
I hope that these samples will be helpful, and you can get more samples form the sample browser.

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
